title: Counting integer points on affine surfaces with a side condition
abstract:
We extend work of Heath-Brown and Salberger, based on the determinant method,
to provide a uniform upper bound for the number of integral points of bounded
height on an affine surface, which are subject to a polynomial congruence
condition. This is applied to get a new uniform bound for points on diagonal
quadric surfaces, and to a problem about the representation of integers as a
sum of four unlike powers.
